title: [INSERT NAME]

fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: Every turn you take after playing this card, add 3 characters to the name of this card.

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:
fields.value: pink:1106716301843497030> + <:cyan:1106716163184009277> + <:magenta:1106716255966220319> + <:orange:1106716206905438231> ): Enter a new line in the character name, allowing you to enter __2 names__ at once. You can add __7 characters__ to each name every turn you take.

desc:
Post 2352
- This card follows the **Legendary Rule**. If a card is played with the **Legendary Rule** and it shares a name with another card that currently has an effect on the game, both cards are immediately removed from the game.
- You replace the current name of this card when you alter the name the 1st time.
